mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.first_id as firstId, t.first_name as firstName, t.first_address as firstAddress, t.second_name as secondName, t.id_card as idCard, t.fee_scale as feeScale, t.fee_total as feeTotal, t.second_address as secondAddress, t.second_phone as secondPhone, t.sign_date as signDate,t.visit_info_id as visitInfoId, t.enclosure_id as enclosureId, t.status as status, t.created as created, t.updated as updated
